title: Biden, Beware: The Nationalist Moment Hasn’t Passed
sub_head: How president-elect handles trade, immigration and climate could soothe or inflame the backlash against globalization
body:
Donald Trump’s election in 2016 was widely seen as a rebuke of globalization, immigration and free trade.
This year, those issues barely registered. They were largely absent from Mr. Trump’s campaign speeches and ads, and didn’t rate among voters’ most important issues, according to exit polls.
Yet this doesn’t mean 2016 was an aberration...
